Actions.Name: Magnetism
Effects: All characters in range 2 of the foe are shoved 1 towards or away from that character ([name] chooses).
At round 3+, deals bonus damage and shatters all foes targeted.

Actions.Name: Anchor
Actions.Description: An ally in range 6 is shoved up to 4 spaces towards the [name] with phasing.

Actions.Name: Disrupt
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is marked. While marked, they are vulnerable+ and take 1 piercing damage, once, for every adjacent character every time they end their turn. If they end their turn with no characters adjacent, end this mark.
